item.title: Run.Bat help? plawks? :|
item.dc:creator: @djspanke djspanke
item.description:
@djspanke wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:12, topic:274735”][quote author=djspanke link=topic=362961.msg2757924#msg2757924 date=1240342026]

What, [quote author=9d n 1 n e link=topic=362961.msg2757707#msg2757707 date=1240330531]
set ur variables
[/quote] was correct? I think you need to reach puberty, my son.

  1. you’re not my father.
    2)i have reched puberty
  2. he needs to set his variables. it may not be good grammar, or a good explaination. but it’s the truth, he needs to set his variables.

Male puberty, or female puberty?

are you a paedophile?

male.
[/quote]
Well, considering your age is “N/A”, I think you might be.[/quote]

my age is N/A? wtfz

soon changed

item.title: Run.Bat help? plawks? :|
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:4, topic:274735”]If you want a simple soultion use this:

set classpath=C:\Program Files\Java\jre6
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar YourMainClass

“YourMainClass” being the class with your main method.[/quote]
(Normally your main class is “server”)

Read full topic

item.title: Run.Bat help? plawks? :|
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

If you want a simple soultion use this:

set classpath=C:\Program Files\Java\jre6
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar YourMainClass

“YourMainClass” being the class with your main method.

Read full topic
